channel.title: Adding Clickable Items

item.title: Adding Clickable Items
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

There could be two possibilities.

  1. You didn’t put the method in the object clicking packet

  2. I’m not positive, but perhaps change the > in your timer to <.

System.currentTimeMillis() - rctimer < 2000

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Clickable Items
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“j19283746, post:1, topic:347276”]Alright I was wondering how to add clickable items where when u click them, it adds money and xp. So I was wondering what I did wrong with this code:

if (objectID == 2664 && System.currentTimeMillis() - rctimer > 2000) {//this adds 5 secs k rctimer = System.currentTimeMillis();//this counts down sendMessage("You Craft... And get 1 Cut Diamond!"); addItem(1601, 1); addSkillXP(10000, 12); }[/quote]

Are you doing it to where you click an object? Or click an item?

Read full topic
